answers.author: Rick Aronhalt
answers.text:
ICMA University conducted a webinar on the topic of negotiating with vendors and included sample contracts for participants. You might want to check it out. http://learning.icma.org/store/seminar/seminar.php?seminar=15195

author: John Jones
text: Our Procurement folks are interested in finding out if anyone has either a software package or plug-in (to MS Word, etc.) with contract templates for specific types of contracts, i.e., construction, software, etc.?
title: Contracts "templates"
